replies.body: Per the [patch notes](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-716-notes#patch-rotating-game-mode), ARURF is here until 25/8/17 07:59 BST.  Some time left, so get in there and have fun!  :D
Why not extend other rotating game modes to last the whole week (or rather two weeks) as well?
Hopefully never. By far my favorite mode. Love the AR factor to it. But all good things must come to an end...
In fact, this is one of the worst for me. I dk why but it doesnt work for me i guess.......
and my friends keep annoying me to play this mode.......
